title: Function Property Names
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use JavaScript to get an array of function property names from an object's own enumerable properties. We will learn how to iterate over an object's properties and use `Object.keys()` and `Object.getPrototypeOf()` to include inherited properties if needed. We will also filter out non-function properties using `Array.prototype.filter()`.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
